sections.paragraph: தானே, தன்னுடையவை, உங்களுக்குள், தங்கள், சுயமாய், தனக்குள், தன்னைத்தான், தன்னிலும், தன்னோடே, தன்னையே - தன் மறிவியல் மறுபெயர்
3 rd person singular and plural, reflexive, reciprocally, mutually, one another

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: (Including all the other cases); from a reflexive pronoun otherwise obsolete and the genitive (dative or accusative) of G846; him (her, it, them, also [in conjunction with the personal pronoun of the other persons] my, thy, our, your) -self (-selves), etc.: - alone, her (own, -self), (he) himself, his (own), itself, one (to) another, our (thine) own (-selves), + that she had, their (own, own selves), (of) them (-selves), they, thyself, you, your (own, own conceits, own selves, -selves).
